Package Debrief.Wrappers.Track

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArrayOffsetHelper.ArrayCentreMode  
    CanBePlottedWithTimeVariable
    interface for classes that wish to use a residual error to assist with their plotting
    ICompositeTrackSegment
    Marker interface for composite track segments
    ITimeVariableProvider
    interface for class that is able to provide the an additional value for specified time stams to help with styling, plus an accessor to find out if that styling should be applied
    TrackColorModeHelper.TrackColorMode  
    TrackWrapper_Support.FixSetter
    interface defining a boolean operation which is applied to all fixes in a track
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbsoluteTMASegment
    extension of track segment that represents a single TMA solution as a series of fixes - based at a fixed origin

    CoreTMASegment
    the core elements of a TMA Segment - relative plotting, plus the fact that the segment is actually defined by a course and speed, not a collection of data points

    PlanningSegment.ClosingSegment
    special case that gives us a leg that goes back to the start
    RelativeTMASegment
    extension of track segment that represents a single TMA solution as a series of fixes - based on an offset from a specified other track
    RelativeTMASegment.TestMe  
    SplittableLayer
    class that includes functionality to split it's children if/when they're more than 15 mins from the previous child

    TrackWrapper_Support

    convenience class that makes our plottables look like a layer
    TrackWrapper_Support.IteratorWrapper
    embedded class to allow us to pass the local iterator (Iterator) used internally outside as an Enumeration
    TrackWrapper_Support.SegmentList
    the collection of track segments
